actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a special resource study of the Hudson River Valley, New York.
short_title: Hudson River Valley Special Resource Study Act

summary.text: Hudson River Valley Special Resource Study Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study of the Hudson River Valley in the state of New York to evaluate: (1) the national significance of the part of the Hudson River that flows from Rodgers Island at Fort Edward to the southernmost boundary of Westchester County, New York (the study area); and (2) the suitability and feasibility of designating the study area as a unit of the National Park System.

titles.title: Hudson River Valley Special Resource Study Act
A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a special resource study of the Hudson River Valley, New York.
